Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
public class Game
extends Observable
Class Game represents a game instance. It contains information about the players, the card decks, the market and the methods to handle them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Game()
    Creates a game object instance that includes the card decks and the market.

    • notifyNewPlayers

      public void notifyNewPlayers​(java.util.List<Player> activePlayers, java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies a player's virtual view with a NewPlayers message containing the nicknames of the active players.
      Parameters:
      activePlayers - the list of active players
      nickname - the nickname of the player to notify
